an official order that allows someone to keep the property of a person who owes them money until the money has been paid back: This could occur where someone has a lien over the goods, i.e. a right to retain possession of them until a debt is paid. State law allows the city to put a lien on the property to grab its money when it's sold.a lien against sth Officials want to place a lien against half of the home to ensure payment.
